summary: a gang of at least three people poured gasoline on a car that stopped to fill up at california gas station early on saturday morning and set the vehicle on fire . the driver of the car , who has not been identified , said he got into an argument with the suspects while he was pumping gas at a 76 station in south los angeles around 12:15am on saturday . the group covered his white dodge charger in gasoline and lit it ablaze while there were two passengers inside .
